verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] considering housing migrant children on military bases in two states , according to report in The Washington Post .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: considering] [ARG1: housing migrant children on military bases in two states] , according to report in The Washington Post .
The Trump administration is considering housing migrant children on military bases in two states , [V: according] to report in The Washington Post .
